statements: UPDATE show_availability SET show_title = 'Game of Thrones', platform_name = 'HBO', rights_available = true WHERE show_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE show_availability SET rights_available = false, show_title = 'Breaking Bad', platform_name = 'Netflix' WHERE show_id = '98765432-1234-5678-9abc-987654321098';
